00040 CReadDisplay::CReadDisplay(CReadWindow* readWindow) : CDisplay(readWindow) {
00041     qWarning("constructor of CReadDisplay");
00042     m_popup = 0;
00043     m_activeAnchor = QString::null;
00044 }

00046 CReadDisplay::~CReadDisplay(){
00047 }

00050 const QString& CReadDisplay::activeAnchor(){
00051   return m_activeAnchor;

00055 void CReadDisplay::setActiveAnchor( const QString& anchor ){
00056   m_activeAnchor = anchor;

00060 void CReadDisplay::installPopup( QPopupMenu* popup ){
00061   qWarning("CReadDisplay::installPopup( QPopupMenu* popup )");
00062   m_popup = popup;
00063 }
00064 
00066 const bool CReadDisplay::hasActiveAnchor(){
00067   return !activeAnchor().isEmpty();
00068 }
00069 
00071 QPopupMenu* const CReadDisplay::installedPopup(){
00072   qWarning("CReadDisplay::installedPopup()");
00073   Q_ASSERT(m_popup);
00074     return m_popup;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CReadDisplay::print(const CDisplay::TextPart type){
00078   CDisplayWindow* window = parentWindow();
00079   CSwordKey* const key = window->key();
00080   CSwordModuleInfo* module = key->module();
00081 
00082   switch (type) {
00083         case Document: {
00084             if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible) {
00085             CSwordVerseKey* vk = dynamic_cast<CSwordVerseKey*>(key);
00086 
00087         CSwordVerseKey startKey(*vk);
00088                 startKey.Verse(1);  
00089                 
00090             CSwordVerseKey stopKey(*vk);
00091                 if (CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module))
00092                     stopKey.Verse( bible->verseCount( bible->bookNumber(startKey.book()), startKey.Chapter() ) );
00093                 CExportManager::printKey(module, startKey.key(), stopKey.key());
00094         }
00095         else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon || module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary ) {
00096             CExportManager::printKey(module, key->key(), key->key());
00097       }
00098     };
00099 
00100     case AnchorWithText: {
00101       if (hasActiveAnchor())
00102                 CExportManager::printKey( activeAnchor() );
00103     };
00104 
00105     default:
00106         break;
00107     }
00108 }
